item.title: Code Python üî®
item.description: Code Python üî® 1 AABCAAADA -> def merger_tool(string , k) for i in range(0 , range(string) , k) t = string[i:i+k] lay substring tu vi tri thu i tuong ung u = "" for c in t: if c not in u u += c print(u) 2 def is_leap(year): leap = False if year % 4 == 0: leap = True # chia het 4 if year % 100 == 0: leap = False if year % 400 == 0: leap = True else: leap = False else: leap = True # Write your logic here return leap year = int(input()) print(is_leap(year)) 3 tinh goc MBC
